PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-23481998-12-210LAB,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of J. PAUL LORDON, of Ottawa, Ontario, as Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and order that J. PAUL LORDON be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act, effective January 1, 1999.
Attachments
